Summary Puja is an independent communications consultant who focuses on spreading new ideas. She believes passionately in the power of ideas to change attitudes, lives, and make the world a better place. She works on communications campaigns for nonfiction books, and with mission driven brands and organizations, including nonprofits and early-stage social ventures, managing all aspects of the communications, media outreach and community engagement strategy.  
 
One of her key strengths is to distill complex ideas into broadly accessible messages for maximum exposure and impact. She is a strategic and creative thinker, who likes to roll up her sleeves to get things done, and has the discipline to analyze the results once she's done. 
 
Puja has developed a deep and trusted network among media--print reporters, broadcast producers, and bloggers. She also works as a pro bono consultant for Taproot Foundation, and is passionate about pro bono service.
